channel.title: How Do I Make This Type Of Client
channel.description:
I've Recently Seen Clients That Hold Only "Play" Inside The Folders Making Anybody Else Un-Able To Access Files.
I Am Making A Server , And Asking For Help On Doing This So Others Wont Tweak/Leech My Client. Can Anybody Direct Me To A Guide , Or Simply Tell Me In A Post Here.
- Thank You

Try to use Vintage’s Client to they have it coded

item.title: How Do I Make This Type Of Client
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

Ok, its easy
make a folder called “Files” and put all the files except “run” and “compile” then right click on “run” and edit it, now you see everything,
here’s mine
@echo off
title Client
cd File
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Now add the cd Files under the @echo off
same with compiling
hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make This Type Of Client
